description: When running a Python program that makes HTTP requests, a SyntaxError is thrown indicating that the requests module is not properly imported. The program is unable to make the necessary requests to complete the task.
code:
import requests

url = 'https://www.example.com'

r = requests.get(url)

if r.status_code == 200:
    print('Success!')
else:
    print('An error has occurred.')
